dcterms:description: MNIST includes 10 labels, each of which corresponds to approximately 6,000 32×32 gray handwritten digital images. 5,000 of them are training data, while 1,000 are for testing.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Kaiming He

dcterms:description: CIFAR10 consists of 10 classes containing 6,000 32×32 RGB images each, suitable for object identification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10

dcterms:description: Fer2013 aims to build a learning model to recognize human expressions automatically, containing approximately 30,000 facial RGB images of different expressions.
dcterms:title: Fer2013

dcterms:creator: Philipp Tschandl
Cliff Rosendahl

dcterms:description: HAM10000 is a large collection of multi-source dermatoscopic images of pigmented lesions, containing nearly 37,000 records about skin lesions.
dcterms:title: HAM10000
